definition: Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall

sentences.english: This season, frequent rainfall, the temperature gradually lower end of the 10 snowbound mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 此季節降雨頻繁，氣溫漸低，10月末將大雪封山。

sentences.english: On a snow coverd winter day, you gave birth to your first child.
sentences.chinese: 在冬季大雪紛飛的一天，您生下了第一個孩子。

sentences.english: His body was buried in snow, but his head was sticking out.
sentences.chinese: 他的身體被大雪掩埋，但是頭部還露在外面。

sentences.english: When the Almighty scattered kings in it, it was white as snow in Salmon.
sentences.chinese: 全能者趕散境內列王的時候，就像撒們山上下大雪。

sentences.english: Both doors were open and snow was fast covering the car.
sentences.chinese: 車門都開着，大雪迅速的蓋住了車。

sentences.english: Snow fell all night on the mountain .
Heavy snow wreaks havoc in northwest China, destroying livestock and blocking roads. Michaela Cabrera reports.
sentences.chinese: 大雪肆虐中國西北部，凍死大量牲畜，阻塞了道路。

sentences.english: Don't risk climbing such a high mountain on so snowy a day.
sentences.chinese: 不要冒險在這麼樣的大雪天登這樣一座高山。

sentences.english: Heavy snowfalls brought traffic to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 大雪使得交通陷入停滯。

sentences.english: "Snowdoesn't present a particular problem, " Niemi explains.
sentences.chinese: “大雪並不會帶來特別的問題，”尼米解釋說。

sentences.english: The snow was blowing in his face, but the gritted his teeth and went on.
sentences.chinese: 大雪撲面，但是他咬緊牙關，繼續前進。

sentences.english: They were lost and stranded by this storm.
sentences.chinese: 它們因大雪迷失了方向而在此徘徊。

sentences.english: It snowed heavily the night before yesterday, but it is rainy today.
sentences.chinese: 前晚下大雪，但是今天卻下起雨來。

sentences.english: Freezing weather conditions and heavy snow are continuing to cause disruptions across the country. Getty Images / Dan Kitwood
sentences.chinese: 嚴寒的天氣和大雪對整個國家繼續着破壞。

sentences.english: The northeast just had its first big snow of the season.
sentences.chinese: 美國東北部剛剛度過了這個冬天的首場大雪。

sentences.english: The invitational football match was snowed off.
sentences.chinese: 那場足球邀請賽因下大雪被取消了。

definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
